iterations.failure_reason: Rule hit but no new signatures
improvement_suggestions: Broaden the YARA patterns to include more wildcards and consider a more dynamic approach to skipping instructions, perhaps based on identifying key instruction sequences rather than fixed offsets.  Instead of relying on fixed offsets for skips, try identifying the function call `call 0039667Fh` and skipping instructions up to the next instruction after the call.
